description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. 3D Stereo Studio is an interactive studio to examine a large collection of stunning 3D anaglyph models. By watching the models with red/blue glasses, the objects become real and jump out of your screen!
description.short: 3D Stereo Studio is an interactive studio to examine a large collection of stunning 3D anaglyph models. By watching the models with red/blue glasses, the objects become real and jump out of your screen!
